name: Mothershiplings
description:
Julian - UI Assets

Daniel - Ship Assets

Markus - Coding

Andreas - Coding+Level 'Design'

-------------------------------------------- What is this?

Explore an unknown universe on board a stolen assembly ship. Build your flotilla and survive against the odds until you reach your way out.

--------------------------------------------How2play

Left Mouse: Select units

Right Mouse: Movement Commands

Middle Mouse/WASD/Arrow Keys: Camera Controls

Scroll: Zoom
